comment._content: A familiar term for divining is "water witching." In theory, the loop (or the pointed end of a forked stick) dips down suddenly when water is detected below. Von Graeve is standing on a boat deck (U.S.S. George Washington), so his loop should be going crazy in a minute . . . .
